clearplot
hold on
t = 0:0.01:20;
v = -10 + 8 * exp(-t);
plot(t, v, 'b')
plot([0.0, 0.5, 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, 4.5, 5.0, 5.5, 6.0, 6.5, 7.0, 7.5, 8.0, 8.5, 9.0, 9.5, 10.0, 10.5, 11.0, 11.5, 12.0, 12.5, 13.0, 13.5, 14.0, 14.5, 15.0, 15.5, 16.0, 16.5, 17.0, 17.5, 18.0, 18.5, 19.0, 19.5, 20.0], [-5.166666666666666, -7.079861111111111, -8.235749421296296, -8.934098608699845, -9.356017909422823, -9.610927486942956, -9.764935356694702, -9.85798177800305, -9.914197324210175, -9.94816088337698, -9.968680533706925, -9.981077822447933, -9.988567851062292, -9.993093076683468, -9.995827067162928, -9.997478853077602, -9.998476807067718, -9.999079737603413, -9.999444008135395, -9.999664088248467, -9.999797053316783, -9.99987738637889, -9.999925920937246, -9.999955243899585, -9.999972959855999, -9.999983663246333, -9.999990129877993, -9.999994036801288, -9.999996397234112, -9.999997823328943, -9.999998684927903, -9.999999205477275, -9.999999519975853, -9.999999709985412, -9.999999824782853, -9.99999989413964, -9.999999936042698, -9.99999996135913, -9.999999976654474, -9.99999998589541, -9.999999991478477], 'r')
